message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and quality, we believe it's worth $12000. Let's discuss how we can reach an agreeable transaction.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and the price I'm willing to pay.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. We appreciate your input and understand your perspective. To move forward, we would like to propose a price of $10500 for the product. This reflects a compromise between our initial asking price and your counteroffer.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9800? I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a serious offer.
We're glad you're willing to meet us halfway, Bob. Considering our costs and the value of the product, we're proposing a price of $10200. We hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9500? I'm willing to make one more serious offer to try to reach an agreement.

We appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to offer the product at $9800. We believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining competitive in the market.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still need to make a bit more of a dent. Would you be willing to consider $9200? I'm willing to make one more serious offer to try to reach an agreement.

We understand your position, Bob. In light of your latest offer, we're willing to negotiate further. Our final offer is $9500 for the product. We hope this allows us to reach a satisfactory conclusion to our discussions.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Unfortunately, I've reached my limit and can't go any higher. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. My final offer is $9000. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll make the purchase.
